verbose_text: Hyper-glycolysis can induce the key glycolytic enzyme hexokinase 2 (HK2), which further results in accumulated acetyl-coenzyme A and subsequent histone acetylation and transcriptional activation of interleukin (IL)-1beta and over-activation of the microglia mediated neuroinflammation after cerebral ischemic stroke.
evidence: histone acetylation and transcriptional activation of interleukin
